seo.title: AI Quiz Generator - Create quizzes from any URL
seo.description: Generate custom quizzes from any URL with this AI-powered generator. A technical demo using Vue.js 3 and the Gemini API to explore contextual content generation.

common.change_immidiate: The language change is applied immediately
common.language_changed_announcement: The page is now in English

concept.title: Create a Quiz from any Web Page
concept.intro: Ready to test your knowledge? Pick a subject. Providing a URL is optional, but highly recommended for a quiz based on your chosen content. Without a URL, the AI will generate the quiz from its general knowledge, according to the selected LLM model.

modal.title: How quiz generation works
modal.description: This project is a technical demonstration that simulates a **RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation)** architecture. The app, built with **Vue 3**, scrapes content from a URL via an abstraction layer that relies on **Jina Reader**'s technology (with a fallback to a custom solution using **jsdom**). This content is then converted into LLM-optimized Markdown and used as context for the **Gemini API**. You can choose from **three different Gemini models** to generate the quiz.

concept.alert: *Disclaimer: The AI is powerful, but not infallible. Remember to double-check critical information.*

isContextEnabled.label: Based on a URL
isContextEnabled.helper: The quiz will be created using only the content of the provided web address.

field.requiered: Required fields are marked with an asterisk (*) and must be filled in to generate the quiz
field.error: Required field must be valid text and not empty

generated.withUrl: The quiz was successfully generated based on url
generated.withFallback: The provided URL could not be used, so it's based on the Gemini 's general knowledge
generated.contextMismatch: the content from the url provided mismatch with the subject of the question

error.generationFailed: Sorry, an error occurred while creating the quiz. Please try again.

results.title: Results
results.finalScore: Your final score is {score} out of {total}.

feedback.perfect: Excellent! You are a quiz master!
feedback.average: Not bad! A little more practice and it will be perfect.

messages.fetchError: Could not load questions. Please check your connection or try again later.
messages.noAnswer: Please select an answer before continuing.
messages.dbError: Probleme when fetching api supabase.Please check your connection or try again later.

gallery.title: Quiz Library
gallery.content: Explore a selection of quality quizzes created by other users, based on sources (provided URLs) in order to limit the context and minimize question hallucinations by LLMs.

about.title: About This Project
about.content: This project is a simple and fun tool for creating your own quizzes. You can generate a test on any topic. For more relevant questions, simply provide a link to a web page: the artificial intelligence will focus on its content to create the quiz. Generation is powered by Google's Gemini AI. It's important to remember that AI, while powerful, can sometimes make mistakes or 'hallucinate' answers. Be sure to check critical information. Please also note that this project is a demonstration and uses models with potentially limited access, which might occasionally slow down quiz creation. Feel free to create your own quiz, or explore the gallery to try those already created by the community!
